categories: Category:Starships of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Raider was a Gladius-class light freighter owned by Sith Acolyte Jor Torlin, an agent of Sith Intelligence and Assassination. He took it to the Wheel in 137 ABY as part of his mission to capture Cade Skywalker. Morrigan Corde overpowered Torlin, taking them to Ossus where she killed him, before leaving in the Raider.
The next year, after Moff Calixte was exposed as a spy for Roan Fel and believed dead, she fled Coruscant aboard the Raider and used the ship to get to the Wheel.
